HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Platba předem: 149 Kč pro objednávky do 250 Kč, 79 Kč pro objednávky od 250 Kč do 999 Kč, ZDARMA pro objednávky nad 999 Kč. Dobírka: 149 Kč pro objednávky do 250 Kč, 109 Kč pro objednávky od 250 Kč do 999 Kč, 30 Kč pro objednávky nad 999 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Platba předem: 149 Kč pro objednávky do 250 Kč, 79 Kč pro objednávky od 250 Kč do 999 Kč, ZDARMA pro objednávky nad 999 Kč. Dobírka: 149 Kč pro objednávky do 250 Kč, 109 Kč pro objednávky od 250 Kč do 999 Kč, 30 Kč pro objednávky nad 999 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 79 Kč pro objednávky do 250 Kč, ZDARMA pro objednávky nad 250 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Dráčik.cz offers three main delivery methods in Czechia: In-store pickup, Home Delivery by an unspecified courier, and delivery to pickup points via PPL Balíkovna, Packeta, and Česká pošta (balíkovna). These pickup point services likely include both parcel shops and lockers, though they are not explicitly differentiated.
PRICING: In-store pickup costs 79 Kč for orders under 250 Kč and is free for orders over 250 Kč. Home delivery and pickup point services share the same pricing structure: for prepaid orders, it's 149 Kč (up to 250 Kč order value), 79 Kč (250-999 Kč), and free (over 999 Kč). A Cash on Delivery (COD) surcharge of 30 Kč applies for orders over 250 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website repeatedly states that delivery options are available 'v případě, že je doručení aktivní' (in case the delivery is active), suggesting availability may vary. No information is provided on delivery times, express options, or weekend delivery. There is no separate information for bulky items.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented in a structured, tabular format, making prices easy to understand. However, it lacks crucial details such as delivery timeframes and the specific courier for home delivery. The conditional availability of services creates uncertainty for the customer.
